trans-unit.source: Represents a container for controls in a ribbon.
trans-unit.target: Representa um contentor para controlos um friso.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra exemplos de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "Ribbon controls") Ribbon controls The following illustration shows how some of these controls appear when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: ![Controlos do friso](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "controlos do friso") controlos a ilustração seguinte mostra como alguns destes controlos aparecem quando estes estão selecionados do Friso.

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls that are selected](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "Ribbon controls that are selected") Ribbon controls that are selected
trans-unit.target: ![Controlos que são selecionados do friso](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "controlos que são selecionados do friso") controlos que são selecionados do Friso

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"> </xref> para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition> contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>contém as propriedades que especificam informações de tamanho e visibilidade para a imagem e a etiqueta associados a um controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"> </xref> para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo está alojado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo está alojado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo está alojado na barra de ferramentas de acesso rápido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: Baseia-se da árvore visual para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"> </xref> quando um novo modelo é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é invocado sempre que o código da aplicação ou um processo interno, como uma reconstrução passagem de esquema, chama o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> objeto para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto de elemento automatização para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the data template changes.
trans-unit.target: Invocada quando altera o modelo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The old data template.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de dados antigo.

trans-unit.source: The new data template.
trans-unit.target: O novo modelo de dados.
